params.lockTime_: Lock time in seconds, will be added to current block timestamp

transfer().details: Note: this will only drip up to the amount of tokens available.

returns._0: The amount of tokens transferred in this call

lockTime().notice: Timestamp after which the transfer can be initiated

transfer().notice: Drips the maximum amount of tokens to match the drip rate since inception

userdoc.notice: Transfers a token to a different address after certain time has passed.
